summary: Diff updates HND logo image paths in the header, hero (App), and menu category watermark to a new “...transparent-clean...” asset. However, the diff does not provide clear evidence that the “Built with Caffeine” credit/link is fully removed from all UI, and it does not include the actual updated logo asset file. The diff also introduces unrelated behavior (e.g., filtering out a “Deals” category) beyond the stated non-goals.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove any visible “Built with … using caffeine.ai” credit/label from the UI (including footer) and remove any outbound link to caffeine.ai; ensure build has no unused imports/variables after removal.
missing_requirements.reason: The provided modified files (App.tsx, SiteHeader.tsx, MenuCategoryGrid.tsx) show logo/path changes and other UI logic, but the diff summary does not show the footer/credit component or any removal of text/link containing “Built with”, “Caffeine”, or “caffeine.ai”. With App.tsx truncated and no footer-specific diff shown, there isn’t sufficient evidence that the credit/link was removed everywhere.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create and use a corrected HND logo asset with fully transparent background and clean edges (hnd-logo-badge-chef-transparent-fixed.dim_512x512.png > hnd-logo-badge-chef-transparent-clean.dim_512x512.png).
missing_requirements.reason: Code references a new asset path (…transparent-clean…), but the diff includes no added/modified image asset file, so there’s no evidence the actual corrected PNG was created/updated as requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Filters out the "Deals" menu category in the frontend (defensive removal).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; non-goals explicitly include no changes to menu item names/prices and no new content changes beyond removing the Caffeine credit and fixing the logo. This is additional business logic affecting what menu categories display.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduces a custom TikTok SVG icon component (and related social/icon UI behavior).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest; goes beyond removing the footer credit and fixing the logo asset.
